totalcross.ui.anim

Class ControlAnimation

  • totalcross.lang.Object
    • totalcross.ui.anim.ControlAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpdateListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FadeAnimation, PathAnimation

    public abstract class ControlAnimation
extends totalcross.lang.Object
implements UpdateListener
    Abstract class used to create and handle animations
    Since:
    TotalCross 3.03
